title: Requires persons assuming exempt class positions to demonstrate their competence for such position through education or professional training
summary: Requires persons assuming exempt non-competitive class civil service positions to demonstrate their competence for such position through education, substantive experience or professional training or examination as deemed appropriate by the civil service commission.

       AN  ACT  to amend the civil service law, in relation to providing compe-

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-

   12  commission  having  jurisdiction  to be not practicable to ascertain the
   13  merit and fitness of applicants by competitive  examination.    Appoint-

   18  POSITION WHO HAS NOT DEMONSTRATED HIS OR HER COMPETENCE FOR  THAT  POSI-
